name: Stargazers (skyeguan)
description:
A game about a youth's coming-of-age pilgrimage towards their dream.

You start from your hometown of the Town of Dedication. Depending on the day of your journey's start, you will end up travelling through different places and encounter new people and experiences while trying not to be swayed by the rebels dubbed the "Stargazers" that you will surely face on the perilous path to becoming a humble merchant.

Currently has three endings, and does not encompass the interactive experiences entire journey-- only the first day, and judges the turnout of your pilgrimage from your answers and actions from that. In the future, the entire pilgrimage may be able to be played out, including multiple love interests and antagonists.
